messages.subject: new member
messages.msgSnippet: hi, i m new member here. actually my knowledge of samurai is very limited to what I ve seen in anime and Kurosawa Akira s films. but we re planning to make
messages.messageBody:
hi, i'm new member here. actually my knowledge of samurai is very
limited to what I've seen in anime and Kurosawa Akira's films. but
we're planning to make story-RPG (forum) based on samurai/ninja life.
and I think it's better to put some basic informations as guide.

I guess I'd better go around at samurai-archive first before asking
here (while the answer is already there) :D
Happy new year!


Dhei.

messages.subject: new member
messages.msgSnippet: Hello all, I am new to the group and hope to learn alot and be able to imput my knowledge as much as possible. I am currently envolved in a living history
messages.messageBody:
Hello all,
I am new to the group and hope to learn alot and be able to imput my
knowledge as much as possible. I am currently envolved in a living
history group whear we leard all about the samurai and their way of
life. thank you and hope to hear from everyone.

Honda Toshitugu
Yamato Daimyo
R.I.
